description: Verification Order required to renumber and confirm the descriptions of the commercial and residential units at 306 and 306A Fulham Road following the refurbishment of the buildings, linked to Planning application PP/21/05191, as follows:Commercial Unit, Ground Floor and Basement, 306A Fulham Road SW10 9ERFlat 1, First Floor, 306 Fulham Road SW10 9ERFlat 2, First Floor, 306 Fulham Road SW10 9ERFlat 3, Second Floor, 306 Fulham Road SW10 9ERFlat 4, Second Floor, 306 Fulham Road SW10 9ERFlat 5, Third Floor, 306 Fulham Road SW10 9ERFlat 6, Third Floor, 306 Fulham Road SW10 9ERThe following addresses to be deleted:306-306A Fulham Road, LONDON, SW10 9ER Flat 1, 306A Fulham Road, LONDON, SW10 9ER Flat 2, 306A Fulham Road, LONDON, SW10 9ER Flat 3, 306A Fulham Road, LONDON, SW10 9ER
